# EXIGENCE-CLASS LIGHT SKIRMISHER

[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 1

[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] Included
"An NIKI light skirmisher that trades survivability for pure speed. Lacks a shield generator, and the hull is obscenely thin. Take extreme caution."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the wall. - Check that each APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit.
- Check that each generator unit is properly anchored. - Check that the generator unit is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the generator unit. - Set each generator unit output power to 40 kW. - Enable Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Ensure that the air canister is wrenched to the connector port. - Check that the air canister is of a suitable atmos mixture (~22% oxygen, ~78% nitrogen). - Enable the gas pump into the distribution system.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that each gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that network ports 1, 2, and 3 are connected to the airlock blast doors, gyroscope access, and bridge window blast door respectively.
